problem_text_cn: 如图,四边形ABCD中,AB与CD不平行,M,N分别是AD,BC的中点,AB=4,DC=2,则MN的长不可能是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the quadrilateral ABCD, AB and CD are not parallel, M and N are the midpoints of AD and BC respectively, AB = N_0, DC = N_1, then the length of MN cannot be ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,连接BD,取BD的中点G,连接MG、NG,∵点M,N分别是AD、BC的中点,∴MG是△ABD的中位线,NG是△BCD的中位线,∴AB=2MG,DC=2NG,∴AB+DC=2(MG+NG),由三角形的三边关系,MG+NG＞MN,∴AB+DC＞2MN,∴MN＜\frac{1}{2}(AB+DC),∴MN＜3；故选:A．∠\frac{D}{G}>≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{D}\\{∠z_{1}÷z_{-2}^{2}:}\\{A}∠_{2}
raw_comment: 本题考查了三角形的中位线定理,三角形的三边关系；根据不等关系考虑作辅助线,构造成以MN为一边的三角形是解题的关键
